name: .APPXUPLOAD File Extension
summary: Learn about .APPXUPLOAD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: App package format introduced with Windows 8; used by developers when packaging Windows 8 apps and submitting them to the Windows Store; contains both the .APPX package as well as symbol debugging information that allows the app to report app crashes back to the developer for debugging and bug fixes.

content: You can create an app upload package in Visual Studio with the Create App Packages wizard. Choose Project → Store → Create App Packages in Visual Studio or Store → Create App Packages in Visual Studio Express.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
